Spells-Primal -- Male Half-Orc Druid: 12
Strength: 16 (+3) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 16 (+3) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 16 (+3) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acrobat Alignment: Lawful Good Deity: Sarenrae (NG)
Experience: 11474/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 7; General: 3; Skill: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Additional Lore (Cavern Lore); Additional Lore (Games Lore); Adopted Ancestry (Elf); Assurance (Diplomacy); Call Of The Wild; Cooperative Nature; Cooperative Soul; Experienced Professional; Fey Caller; Group Impression; Hobnobber; Order Explorer (Wild); Overwhelming Energy; Quick Squeeze; Reach Spell; Skill Training (Religion); Steady Spellcasting; Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd); Widen Spell Druid Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Alertness; Anathema; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Druid Feats; Druid Skills; Druid Weapon Expertise; Druidic Language; Druidic Order; Expert Spellcaster; General Feats; Great Fortitude; Leaf; Lightning Reflexes; Perception Trained; Primal Spellcasting; Resolve; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Primal); Wild Empathy Acrobat Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Strength; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Circus Lore); Steady Balance Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Orc; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 3 selections
Druid Feats: 6 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
General Feats: 3 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 6 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Elf): May take Elf ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic orders
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Order Explorer (Wild): May learn Wild order feats
Perception: +19 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +17 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +16 (charisma; trained) Occultism: +3 (intelligence; untrained)

Leaf: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 5 from any)
Skill Training (Religion): Skill Trained (Religion)
Assurance (Diplomacy): May forgo rolling a Diplomacy check for an automatic 24
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures when using Aid with expert skills are successes
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures; normal failures give twice the income
Group Impression: May use Diplomacy to Make an Impression with 2 targets
Hobnobber: May Gather Information in half normal time
Quick Squeeze: May Squeeze 5'/rd, or 10'/rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: All Balance successes are critical successes/Never flat-footed during Balance/May use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Wild Empathy: May use Diplomacy with animals to Make an Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 140 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Blowgun (+19 1 P R20'; dexterity; expert); Mace (+19 1d6+3 B; strength; expert); Sickle (+19 1d4+3 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +36
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Druid Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd): Treats Halberd as one category simpler
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +19 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +19 (dexterity; expert); Will: +21 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: P0: 5; P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; P6: 3 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Primal: +19 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Primal: 29 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Aberrant Whispers (P3 Enc): 5' emanation (10'/15' emanation for 2/3 actions) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases radius by 5')
Abyssal Wrath (P5 Evo): 60' cone inflicts 4d6 HP of variable type (roll d4): bludgeoning and electricity; acid and slashing; bludgeoning and cold; fire and piercing (save Reflex half; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Acid Arrow (P2 Evo): R120' Spell attack inflicts 3d8 HP acid (critical hit doubles) plus 1d6 HP persistent acid (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Acid Splash (P0 Evo): R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid (critical hit also 1 HP persistent acid) and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+3 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+3 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+3 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+3 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Aerial Form (P4 Tra): Self becomes choice of a medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp (heightened 5th large creature; 6th huge creature) for 1 min
Air Bubble (P1 Con): R60' Allows target to breathe normally for 1 min
Air Walk (P4 Tra): Touched may walk on air up to a 45-degree angle for 5 min
Alarm (P1 Abj): 20' burst triggers choice of mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying the specified password for 8 hr
Ancestral Memories (P1 Div): Self becomes trained in choice of non-Lore or ancestral Lore skill for 1 min (heightened 6th expert in chosen skill)
Angelic Halo (P1 Abj): 15' emanation increases the effects of Heal by double the Heal spell's level
Angelic Wings (P3 Evo): Self may fly at full Speed and casts a 30' radius bright list for 3 rd (heightened 5th lasts 1 min)
Animal Form (P2 Tra): Self transforms into choice of Medium animal with 5 temporary HP, AC 28, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and animal-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 3rd 10 temporary HP, AC 29, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th Large animal with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, AC 30, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th Huge animal with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, AC 30, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Animal Messenger (P2 Enc): R120' Target Tiny animal carries a small object or note to specified destination for up to 24 hr
Animal Vision (P3 Div): R120' Self can share target animal's senses (save Will negates) for 1 hr
Ant Haul (P1 Tra): Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr
Arcane Countermeasure (P5 Abj): R120' Reduces target heightened spell's level by 1 and gives that spell's targets +2 saves, skill checks, AC, or DC against it
Baleful Polymorph (P6 Tra): R30' Transforms target into a harmless animal for 1 min (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure extends transformation indefinitely; save may be repeated each rd)
Banishment (P5 Abj): R30' Returns target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on caster; critical failure prevents target return for 1 week) (heightened 9th may target up to 10 creatures)

Blindness (P3 Nec): R30' Blinds target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure makes effects permanent)

Magic Notes:
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Fey Caller: Knows the Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object, Illusory Scene, and Veil primal spells
Leaf: Knows the Goodberry spell/+1 Focus Points
Call Of The Wild: May spend 10 min to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same level
Overwhelming Energy: (1) May cast a spell that ignores resistance 12 to choice of energy
Primal Spellcasting: May learn spells from the primal tradition
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
